txt.en: You should attack the Jangovar encampment of Urûshoba, which is located south-east of Tay Yoldash in the Dale-lands.

'I learned some things about these Jangovar, [placeholder], before I slipped away and hid. Do you not think it strange that they cling to the Dale-lands, days and days after their defeat? Know that it is all Akshir. Others wish to leave. Again and again, he refuses. I heard one Jangovar grumble how his reasons change, but ever he insists they must stay.\n\n'I cannot answer the riddle of why, but I think if Akshir were gone, the Jangovar might soon return to the East and leave this valley alone.'
TBD
Defeated enemies ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Destroy weapons in Urûshoba ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Defeat Akshir
Destroyed weapons ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Return to the Jangovar camp of Urûshoba
Akshir uses sorcery to escape!
Orphón believes that Akshir alone is the reason why the Jangovar remain in the Dale-lands.
TBD
Akshir must be somewhere in this encampment
Erna can be found in the Great-keep in Dale.\n\nYou should return to Queen Regent Erna with news of your fight with Akshir.
'My task remains, pesky [placeholder]. The destruction of the Dale-lands or death. Glory to the Jangovar!'
Defeat Akshir

You tell the Queen Regent and the young King all you learned and did. After a grave pause, Erna speaks.\n\n'You have done well, very well in the service of Dale, [placeholder]. Yet it is clear that some deep scheme is afoot, and it runs deep through this land.'
The boy's lower lip trembles.\n\n'What did you say became of this Akshir? It is only that you ended abruptly, and I wish to know.'
Return to Erna
'Whatever you hoped to gain was for naught, [placeholder]. The work is nearly done, and you have hindered little, for all your meddling!'
Akshir uses sorcery to escape!
You should enter the Jangovar encampment of Urûshoba, south-east of Tay Yoldash in the Dale-lands.
Defeat enemies in Urûshoba ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
What do you know of Akshir?!
You have halted the Jangovar plans.
Akshir the Unrelenting
